title: Colour Idioms
instructions: Work in pairs using one phone between you. Take turns to rephrase the sentence using the keyword given.

cards.sentence: The job had been offered to her quite unexpectedly.
cards.answer: The job had been offered to her out of the blue.

cards.sentence: She let him into the office and gave him one minute before catching him in the act of photocopying the documents.
cards.answer: She let him into the office and gave him one minute before catching him red-handed.

cards.sentence: All your colleagues must be envious when they see these shoes.
cards.answer: All your colleagues must be green with envy when they see these shoes.
